I cannot believe we totally fell for it.
Jotaro and company stopped The Lovers' cowardly attack.
To avoid the politically unstable route from Iran to Iraq,
they crossed the Arabian Sea at Karachi,
and entered the United Arab Emirates.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
If a cute girl like you asked me to,
I might even buy them a car.
How about we get dinner sometime?
Polnareff, I am terribly sorry to interrupt when you are so busy, but...
Do not mess with the hair.
It is really hard to get this hairdo right.
But, man, Mr. Joestar, why are we riding in such a fancy,
expensive car in this sandy place?
Why not get an off-road vehicle?
You will find out soon enough.
But, man, I cannot believe this country.
Every house we see is like a mansion.
All the houses around here would
cost 3 or 4 billion yen in Tokyo.
Apparently, this is the norm for the people here.
Just twenty years ago, this was all desert,
but thanks to massive profits from the oil crisis,
this place grew into a dream-like city.
but with air conditioning, it is perfectly comfortable inside the car.
If anyone were after us, I am sure we would spot them,
but I feel like someone is watching us, so I cannot help looking back.
I have been thinking about our route from here.
About 100 kilometers northwest is a village called Yarpline.
Because of the desert and mountains, the road is heavily curved.
It takes two days to reach by car,
so the villagers use a Cessna to travel.
I think we should go to the village first,
buy a Cessna, and cross the vast Saudi Arabian desert.
Up to now, I have been worried that attacks by Stand users
would cause any airplane we rode in to crash,
But if we have a Cessna, I can pilot it,
and it will shorten our travel time.
I do not really want to board a Cessna with a man
who is been through three plane crashes.
I think we should first cross this desert
to get to the village of Yarpline.
On camels, it would take one day.
A Cessna's one thing, but wait a minute!
I have never ridden a camel before.
I will teach you how to ride.
Sure, but they are pretty expensive
and not easy to care for.
We are in a serious, life-or-death situation,
so we need them, whatever it takes.
As for payment, how about a trade for that car?
That is way too much, sir.
Besides, you just bought that car!
Why else do you think I bought such a fancy, expensive car?
An off-road vehicle is better in the desert.
But I would not be able to write a check in a place like this,
and they do not trust cash here.
In a place like this, trading is far more effective.
If you try to buy safety for cheap in a time of emergency,
you will end up even worse off in the end.
Well, it just means we have suffered a lot already.
I would like the water in those tanks there.
In a desert, that is the most important thing.
Water is cheap compared to that car.
You sure are an odd one.
Crossing a desert is a tough task.
Let us keep our wits about us!
How do you get on it?
It is, like, three meters tall.
You make them sit first, and then get on.
You make them sit first, and then get on...
You make them sit, then get on!
It is going to sit down right now.
Hey, you have ridden one of these before, right?
I have seen that really long movie, Lawrence of Arabia, three times!
I know very well how to ride a camel!
Though, two of those times, I slept through half of it...
You have never actually ridden one?
When dealing with animals, it is important to understand how they feel.
Here, does not this apple look delicious?
If you take time to understand the camel, it will sit down for you!
They can close their nostrils to keep sand out.
Just do not make any stupid jokes
Once you get over the hump, it is easy, or they will kick you.
Now I will tell you what to be careful with when riding camels.
Camels do not walk like horses.
The front and back leg on the same side
move forward together, so they sway a lot.
So just ride with that rhythm.
Looks like everyone got on as smoothly as planned.
Let us get through that desert, everyone!
I still cannot shake the feeling that someone is watching us.
Kakyoin, I think you are worrying a bit too much.
The palm leaves are covering our tracks.
And we can see a great distance around us.
If someone were here, we would know.
Actually, I cannot help but feel a presence, too.
Hey, let us hurry up and go.
Let us get as far as we can,
and once the sun goes down, we will stop and put up our tents.
It is too dangerous to travel at night.
But it is always hottest around this time of day...
What time does your clock say?
I-I know we lost track of time,
So why is not the sun going down?
The thermometer just jumped to 60 degrees Celsius!
N-Not only is it not going down...
We are in the middle of the desert!
Try to hide behind some rocks!
I felt like we were being watched, but could not see it at all...
At this rate, all day long...
to boil us overnight, like octopuses,
It will not take that long.
It is dangerous to even be in a sauna for more than thirty minutes.
Not to mention, we cannot even tell if that Stand is close or far away!
The distance is impossible to judge!
The quickest way to settle this is to take out the user.
Whoever it is should be nearby.
They have been concealing their presence from us somehow while
What if it is like The Lovers
that we encountered in Pakistan, a Stand that can be remotely controlled?
A weak Stand can be controlled from a distance,
but I am sure you can feel The Sun's energy...
The camels are collapsing from the heat.
But just staying still will not help us!
I will use Hierophant to look around.
I will just find out the enemy Stand's location.
If we know how far away it actually is,
we might be able to find the user.
I am busting a hole in the ground, so get in!
I was in the middle of using Emerald Splash.
That guarded me, so I am not badly hurt.
B-But more importantly, it is hot...
I feel like I am going to go crazy.
That means the enemy is definitely watching us.
Let us just sit tight and see what happens.
Things cannot go on like this...
This is the time for an old-timer like me to shine!
But we are in a bad spot.
I cannot even use my best technique.
I have to get some information...
Is the enemy invisible or something?!
E-Everyone is finally lost it because of the heat.
I am the only one left who is sane.
The best way to win when the going gets rough is to stay calm!
Do not get the wrong idea, Mr. Joestar...
Look at that rock over there.
Is not it just big enough for someone to hide behind?
Now look at the rock on the opposite side.
You still do not see it?
There is a rock that is shaped exactly the same
Out of my way, Old Man.
If you go outside right now,
you are all but asking to be attacked!
A hole appeared in the air?!
I will just assume that the heat's too much for you.
Otherwise, it is hard to believe you are my grandfather.
We have defeated the enemy Stand, so it is night now.
Or should I say it is back to being night?
How long do you plan to stay in that hole?
Check out the machines behind this mirror.
Man, I did not realize that he was reflecting the desert
landscape and tailing us from behind.
He has a tank of water.
Wait, this means... we beat him already?
We do not even know this guy's name,
but we have already beaten his Stand, The Sun?
That would be what it means.
but once you figure it out, it is pretty stupid.
Let us hurry to our next destination.
It is quite chilly in the desert at night, is not it?
so we can have sweet dreams tonight.
